original_text: The people who were listening to Jesus said, ‘So perhaps God will not save anyone!’
korean_text: 듣는 자들이 이르되 그런즉 누가 구원을 얻을 수 있나이까

sentences.original_text: The people who were listening to Jesus said
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님의 말씀을 듣고 있던 사람들이 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: 'So perhaps God will not save anyone!'
